definition: thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
to dash/to move forward quickly/to bulge/to protrude/to break through/to rush out/sudden/Taiwan pr. [tu2]

sentences.english: This fear is that these minor clashes may develop into all-out confrontation.
sentences.chinese: 人們還怕這些小衝突會發展成爲全面的對峙。

sentences.english: The settlers already were calling themselves "Texans." Minor hostilities broke out between Texans and local Mexican officials.
sentences.chinese: 德克薩斯人與當地的墨西哥官員暴發了一些小衝突。

sentences.english: After about 20 minutes, the skirmish was over.
sentences.chinese: 經過約20分鐘對打，這場小衝突就醬結束了。

sentences.english: As Dora discovered, a little conflict won't kill you.
sentences.chinese: 如同多拉發現的那樣，小衝突不致命。
他跟他的對手發生小衝突。

sentences.english: All the rest was nothing but skirmishes.
sentences.chinese: 在其餘的一切地方都只是小衝突。
